get.description: Returns access policy resource for a given name.
Returns event resource for a given id.

delete.description: Deletes event resource for a given id.

post.description: Upload an image and return its corresponding image id.

get.description: Returns metaverse resource for a given id.

delete.description: Deletes metaverse resource for a given id.

post.description: Upload an image and return its corresponding image id.

get.description: Returns access policy resource for a given name.
Returns space resource for a given id.

delete.description: Deletes space resource for a given id.

get.description: Returns template resource for a given id.

startTime.description: The start time of the event.

endTime.description: The end time of the event.

defaultPrimaryUrl.description: The default primary URL of the event.

instructions.description: The instructions to join the event.

openTime.description: The open time of the event.

closeTime.description: The close time of the event.

spaceTemplateId.description: The id of the template associated with the event.

metaverseId.description: The id of the metaverse associated with the event.

supportedPlatform.description: The supported platform of the event.

titleImage.description: The title image of the event.

bannerImage.description: The banner image of the event.

ImageData.description: Contains data for an image upload request.

base64Image.description: The base-64 encoded contents of the image.

ImageReference.description: Contains an image id reference. This is not an Azure Resource Manager reference.

imageId.description: A unique identifier for the image. This is not an Azure Resource Manager identifier.

iconImageId.description: The id for the metaverse icon image. This is not an Azure Resource Manager id.

backgroundImageId.description: The id for the metaverse background image. This is not an Azure Resource Manager id.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of operations.

metaverseId.description: ID of the metaverse corresponding to the space.

imageInfo.description: The image information of the template.

assetInfo.description: The asset information of the template.

entitySpecificMetadata.description: The entity specific metadata of the template.

meshTags.description: The mesh tags of the template.

MetaverseNameParameter.name: metaverseName
MetaverseNameParameter.description: The name referring to the metaverse resource.

EventIdParameter.name: eventId
EventIdParameter.description: The id referring to the event resource. This id must be a GUID.

TemplateIdParameter.name: templateId
TemplateIdParameter.description: The id referring to the template resource. This id must be a GUID.

SpaceIdParameter.name: spaceId
SpaceIdParameter.description: The id referring to the space resource. This id must be a GUID.

AccessPolicyNameParameter.name: accessPolicyName
AccessPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the access policy.
